page.title: 11HOUSING 3
page.content: A long time ago the council wanted lots of houses for low cost, so they designed {Terraced houses}which are plain and colourless. They are cramped inside and all look the same. The{ {front gardens}are small. They are generally uncared for, perhaps because the owners are at work, and are not interested or do not have enough money for plants and equipment. Some gardens are looked after but their appearance is spoiled by rubbish and vandalism. Many houses have multi-occupation which leads to problems about the use of the gardens. Because of {Noise and {Dirt}and the lack of a pleasant view no-one sits in the front gardens. Noise and dirt go together in the streets of Wood Green. Traffic, annimals, humans; everything in its own way destroys the peace.
